Package com.example.collectqr

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AdminActivity
    This is an activity that provides administrator functionality.
    CreateAccountActivity
    This is an activity that provides the means for the user to create a new account.
    CustomList
    Code adapted for the ListViews of Users taken from the Lab CustomList sample code and altered to match the User classes better.
    Database
    Helper class that connects with the Firestore
    DbCollection<T extends DbDocument>
    Represents a collection within Firestore along with some helper methods
    DbDocument  
    DeleteUserConfirmationFragment
    Fragment to confirm user deletion in the admin pane
    HomeActivity
    This is an activity that provides the user with their account information and basic actions.
    IntroActivity
    This activity introduces new users to the app and gives them the choice to make a new account or continue on an existing one by scanning its generated QR code.
    Location  
    MainActivity
    This is the starting activity that intents to a certain activity depending on if the user has an existing account.
    ProfileActivity
    Activity to view profile stats, access gallery, and obtain user code
    QRCode
    An object that represents a QR Code object, containing its score, information, photo, comment and location
    QRGenerator
    This is a class that, given a username, can generate a QR code to represent that user
    QRInfoActivity
    Activity to that showcases information about a User's scanned QR Code
    QRListActivity
    Activity to that showcases a user's scanned QR codes
    QRListAdapter
    Acn adapter for the a customer array for the User QR Code gallery.
    QRScore
    Calculates the score of a given QR code
    ScanResultActivity
    Activity that is shown after a valid scan Enables the user to add location info and a photo to the QR Code before adding it
    Search
    An object to keep track of a DbCollection in order to locate users for Search
    SearchActivity
    An activity that displays options for the user to search for other user profiles through QR code or username
    User
    An object that represents the user, containing all their QR Codes and scores
    ViewAdminCodesFragment
    Fragment that display's a list of all QR codes registered
    ViewAdminUsersFragment
    Fragment to display the admin users list, with the ability to delete a user.
    ViewQrCodeFragment
    Fragment to represent a qr code.
